html:
1.9.21  8:37 am   is your Instagram post a teaser for the new song?

      yes

1.9.21  8:28 am   My brain hurts. To have any sort of belief or opinion you need to accept the perspective of it, and that means to refuse all other contrasting perspectives.

     that's not necessarily true

     However each point of view has its value, and I feel like I'm loosing a lot by ever ending up having an opinion

     one weird trick is to have all the opinions

1.9.21  8:25 am   why can't i be as motivated in school as I am in digging holes at the beach

      because you don't like school as much

1.9.21  8:13 am   what do i do i'm bored

      how about opening up a can of worms

1.9.21  7:48 am   One thing that kinda "scares" me whenever I listen to or watch interviews of people I respect for their creativity, is that every time they are asked about how did they become so creative, they all answer that, at some point, struggles and panic drive you. So, my question is, how can you become creative if you don't have any struggles in your everyday life?

      believe me, there are some people that come about it in a very happy and carefree way

1.9.21  7:17 am   How do you feel about repeating questions?

      pretty good

1.9.21  6:56 am   Do you think there are more feelings 

      yes

1.9.21  6:44 am   hi. im curious. how good are you at replicating or playing back a piece of music perfectly by ear. weather it be on keys, guitars, drums, etc without looking it up online for chords, sheets, etc?

     fine

     id figure you're probably the best.

     Well, looking it up online would be useful if you are looking up an AUDIO RECORDING online, so you can actually hear what it really is. If you are trying to 'look up' chords online in a non-audio way (like a chord chart), i am sorry to say it will almost definitely be wrong

1.9.21  6:41 am   what shape is soup

      YOU DECIDE

1.9.21  6:28 am   Bill i just wanted to say your stuff is something I find myself always happy to go back to. There's just something about your style that cuts through my depression, and I just wanted to say thank you for the smiles. 

      holy smokes, you've taken on some friendly attributes

1.9.21  5:37 am   I've recently found that my dreams are incredibly more vivid, striking, emotional, fun and overall more aesthetically compelling than anything in my actual reality. Should I place myself into a perpetual dream state

     maybe

     and if so how

     you might have to wait until about Windows 57

1.9.21  4:54 am   i just started learning to play the keyboard. I'm in the process of learning sheet music and playing with both hands at once, however i also have academics. how much time should one dedicate to playing a new instrument so that they don't forget it but they also can do other things? 

      i'm not sure. i've never learned an instrument in the way that you are doing it, and i've also never done academics

1.9.21  4:37 am   what's your favorite map projection?

      sphere

1.9.21  4:19 am   I wonder what makes the life we have so interesting and stuff

      time and space

1.9.21  4:15 am   how do i make friends 

      it's you. you are the friend

1.9.21  4:07 am   Is the client's name always there?

      where

1.9.21  3:47 am   Are you anxious right now?

      that's preposterous. who do you think i am

1.9.21  3:47 am   Can you recommend a type of mental gymnastic I should try

      waking up

1.9.21  3:33 am   Why is the sun so bright

      so you can see the ground

1.9.21  3:22 am   i have less than a month before i go back to school. what should i do in the time i have left?

      try to learn everything. so maybe by the time you get to school, maybe they will let you teach

1.9.21  3:13 am   how can i be funny give me tips pls

      anyone can be funny. just do stuff that's not funny and wait for people to be mad at you for not being funny. at least that's the way i do it

1.9.21  2:44 am   how did you learn modulation? by yourself or taught by someone?

      i did it by myself, but, i was also able to have access to recordings of a lot of songs recorded by other people, from the past 100 years or so

1.9.21  2:37 am   Why is grass green?

      to inspire, and dazzle you

1.9.21  2:07 am   Hi Bill. How many planets are you willing to sing about?

      as many as i know of, or can imagine

1.9.21  1:51 am   What's the most pleasing font?

      helvetica sans seriff. there is no freakin seriff on that thing

1.9.21  1:50 am   Hey, Bill. I've been trying to pursue drumming, but I don't know any good songs to start off practicing on. Any suggestions?

      if you don't know any good songs, ...... then i'm .... wondering what makes you interested in music

1.9.21  1:43 am   with the idea that your newer videos are going to focus more on 3d animation,

     actually, the videos are supposed to focus more on the WRITING and simply be whatever is the most effective way to deliver what was written

      is it theoretically possible to fully experience your videos in VR?

     no

     how does this concept make you feel?

     like jumping head first into a can of fresh worms, and closing the lid

     would you try it?

      maybe after i am able to get out of the 7 cans of worms i am already in

1.9.21  1:35 am   whats it like to be bill wurtz

      it's very calming, sort of like when you put an electric chair into another electric chair

1.9.21  1:30 am   What do you do if you can't get the right sound 

      how about combining 500 other sounds

1.9.21  1:23 am   When is the best time to write down a melody

      before you forget it

1.9.21  1:15 am   Why don't you use Capital letters?

      i do, but, the reason why you may think i don't might be because you have been paying absolutely zero attention whatsoever

1.9.21  1:06 am   Have you become secretly trapped in your website and are only able to answer questions?

     no

      Blink twice is yes, blink once if no.

     i'm going to need to blink more times than that, just during today alone. but blinks probably wouldn't be conveyed here, due to the format of this page

1.9.21  1:04 am   Whats your opinion on drywall?

      too wet

1.9.21  1:02 am   How does one enjoy a Monday?

     how about saving the world

     I don't think I've ever enjoyed a Monday in my life. Also, what's your favorite day of the week?

      Tuesday

1.9.21  12:58 am    how do i write an essay

      set up some hoops, and then start writing things directly through those hoops

1.9.21  12:38 am   How do I remember my address?

      write it down on your house

1.9.21  12:33 am   What is your opinion on starting your sentences with capital letters?

      meh

1.9.21  12:25 am   Will you name one word that will be in your next song

      sure

1.8.21  11:51 pm   suggest what I can draw, I'm out of ideas.

      how about the forward march of time

1.8.21  11:47 pm   What's your favorite song you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.8.21  11:21 pm   how fast is time passing for you

      oh i'd say about a few seconds per moment

1.8.21  11:03 pm   1.7.21 11:33 pm Since "The Stupid Song" doesn't mention the word "stupid" in its lyrics, how about you rename it "hear me" after the latter half of the chorus?

      already done it, and had to change it back because it failed to convey the crucial starting mindset which seems to make the whole song function properly

1.8.21  10:39 pm   how do you hear the rest of the notes in a chord? since I play bass I can figure out the bass note and whether it's major/minor, but I have no idea if it's a G/B or Amin#11 or whatever

      just figure out a lot of songs. eventually you will figure out everything

1.8.21  8:56 pm   what is your favorite species of tree?

      trunk

1.8.21  8:53 pm   Are you going to make more videos?

      yes

1.8.21  8:13 pm   Bill, what do you do when your life is in shambles and you've lost all your friends who meant everything to you?

      sing a song

1.8.21  6:51 pm   do you think of changing your mind?

      i dream of it

1.8.21  6:14 pm   Am I a human?

      oh that would cause a lot of pieces of the picture to make sense

1.8.21  6:01 pm   who are your favorite artists

      could be you

1.8.21  5:56 pm   bill, should I write lyrics or music first?

      not if you want to really get the most out of both
